parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Ceases the using of the vehicle by a group and unassigns vehicle from the group. If the argument is a single unit, the vehicle will be unassigned from unit's group. After vehicle is unassigned from the group, each individual crew member then unassigned from the vehicle.
<br><br>In short the command could be hypothetically presented as:<br>
<tt>[[leaveVehicle]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> un-[[addVehicle]] + [[unassignVehicle]] [[forEach]] [[crew]]</tt> <br>
However, to make it more reliable, it is best to move unit out of the vehicle manually with [[moveOut]] command and force unassign the vehicle with [[unassignVehicle]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> group '''leaveVehicle''' vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] or [[Object]], in which case, object's [[Group]] is used

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_unit [[leaveVehicle]] _vehicle</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_grp [[leaveVehicle]] _vehicle</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addVehicle]], [[assignAsCargo]], [[assignAsCommander]], [[assignAsDriver]], [[assignAsGunner]], [[assignedVehicle]], [[unassignVehicle]], [[doGetOut]], [[commandGetOut]], [[createVehicleCrew]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on August 31, 2013</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone_Kid|Killzone_Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">In Arma 3 this command will not force a player to exit from a vehicle. It will unassign vehicle role for this player. AI crew however will also disembark.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
